definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Australian beef tenderloin, truffle mashed potato, roasted vegetables, red wine sauce.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲牛里脊，松露土豆泥，烤时蔬，红酒汁。

sentences.english: Roast Wagu Beef, Mushroom Salad, Mashed Potato, Beef Sauce.
sentences.chinese: 香烤和牛里脊，鲜菌，土豆泥，牛肉汁。

sentences.english: I'm afraid I don't like bread with potato ketchup.
sentences.chinese: 我想我不大爱吃面包加土豆泥。

sentences.english: Roasted half chicken covered with barbecue sauce. Served with mashed potato and corn.
sentences.chinese: 碳烤春鸡淋上烧烤酱，配以芝士土豆泥和烤玉米。

sentences.english: Traditional jewish dish, cooked chicken liver and onion, served with mashed potato.
sentences.chinese: 传统犹太风味，洋葱香料炒鸡肝，配土豆泥。

sentences.english: Mounds of turkey piled high with buttery mashed potatoes, dripping with gravy.
sentences.chinese: 成堆的火鸡盛满了黄油土豆泥，滴肉汁。

sentences.english: Poached Asparagus, Potato Puree, Three Citrus Beurre Blanc.
sentences.chinese: 煮芦笋，土豆泥，柑橘牛油沙司。

sentences.english: Push the potatoes through a sieve to make a puree.
sentences.chinese: 用漏勺轧土豆做成土豆泥。

sentences.english: Can you show me how to make mashed potatoes?
sentences.chinese: 你能教我怎么做土豆泥吗？

sentences.english: Roasted vegetables, mash potatoes, French fries.
beaver and mashed potato is served as a delicacy;
sentences.chinese: 海狸肉和土豆泥是当地人的美味。

sentences.english: Don't play around with food or make faces in your potato mash.
sentences.chinese: 不要摧残华侈辚轹食品与将土豆泥涂在自己的脸上。

sentences.english: Ellen said as she happily set a bowl of mashed potatoes.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦说，高高兴兴地端上来一盆土豆泥。

sentences.english: Avoid mashed potatoes and baked potatoes.
I've never been to a festival. I'm a creature of habit, mashed-potato comfort, I like rugs.
sentences.chinese: 我是个依赖习惯的家伙，喜欢那种土豆泥般的舒适感。

sentences.english: Scorpio puts extra garlic in the mashed potatoes.
sentences.chinese: 天歇座又往土豆泥里加了些大蒜。
